ygData.subject: Re: Re: What to buy?
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh yea, another thing I didn t mention in my retort to Clarity The Everknowing, was that your monk quest items for your sashes, are items you can easily buy
ygData.messageBody:
Oh yea, another thing I didn't mention in my retort to Clarity The
Everknowing, was that your monk quest items for your sashes, are items you
can easily buy off of higher level people adventuring in the same places
that the items spawn. Before they changed Paw, I used to hang in there
killing the stuff around 10-14th, and there were always high level people in
there killing the high level mobs shouting out things like "What the heck is
a head of Shin?", of course my reply would always be "Monk quest item, need
it for anything? I could take it off your hands." Hehe, I got most of my
sashes/headbands that way. Anyway, hopefully he won't jump me again for for
trying to give you some good advice.

Shelza, 18th, Karana

>From: Andy Sands <andy.sands@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Re: What to buy?
>Date: Fri, 04 Feb 2000 18:31:21 +0000
>
>Hehe Clarity
>
>Starting a fight on my behalf?
>
> >I'm sorry, but what are you talking about? Herrick is a level 12 monk
>talking
> >about saving up scarab carapaces for 1.7gp each! Do you think this guy
>has
> >30pp to go buy a bracer of erolisi? or 100pp to get a silver-plated
>bracer?
> >Please tell me what armor better than cured even a level 18 can go get?
>
>13th now :)
>I have seen people selling Lockjaw Vests around Freeport, and was thinking
>of saving for one. They are about 30pp.. and I've about 11 saved so far..
>
>Admittedly it's a lot at my level, but if I saved up 50pp for some Wu's
>then by the time I hit 18, I should have bought a bit more stuff (although
>I am currently spending most of my income on training up my brewing skill)
>
>Finally got my orange sash too.
>
>
>--
>Herrick of Quellious [Champions of Justice]
>13th Circle
>Bristlebane
>
>E-mail: andy@...
